cards.title: The Dozen / The best photos from the European Championship qualifiers
cards.rawTitle: The best photos from the European Championship qualifiers

item.title: The Dozen: the best photos from the Euro 2016 qualifiers
item.trailText: We round up our favourite pictures from a dramatic weekend of action across Europe
item.standFirst: Our favourite images from the weekend’s qualifying action across Europe

displayImages.caption: Sweden’s Marcus Berg scores the opening goal, beating Montenegro’s goalkeeper Vukasin Poleksic. Photograph: Tt News Agency/Reuters
displayImages.altText: Swedens’ Marcus Berg scores the opening goal beating Montenegro’s goalkeeper Vukasin Poleksic.
displayImages.cleanCaption: Sweden’s Marcus Berg scores the opening goal, beating Montenegro’s goalkeeper Vukasin Poleksic.

displayImages.caption: Wayne Rooney is met by the elbow of Slovenia’s Boston Cesar. Photograph: Samuel Kubani/AFP/Getty Images
displayImages.altText: Wayne Rooney meets the elbow of Slovenia's Boston Cesar.
displayImages.cleanCaption: Wayne Rooney is met by the elbow of Slovenia’s Boston Cesar.

displayImages.caption: An England fan climbs the netting around the pitch after the final whistle in Slovenia. Photograph: John Sibley/Reuters
displayImages.altText: An England fan climbs to the top of the netting around the pitch after the final whistle in Slovenia.
displayImages.cleanCaption: An England fan climbs the netting around the pitch after the final whistle in Slovenia.

displayImages.caption: Austria’s Marc Janko scores a spectacular overhead kick against Russia. Photograph: Valery Sharifulin/ITAR-TASS Photo/Corbis
displayImages.altText: Austria’s Marc Janko with a spectacular overhead to score against Russia.
displayImages.cleanCaption: Austria’s Marc Janko scores a spectacular overhead kick against Russia.

displayImages.caption: The Poland head coach, Adam Nawalka, shows he still has a decent touch during their Group D qualifier match against Georgia. Photograph: Bartlomiej Zborowski/EPA
displayImages.altText: Poland’s head coach Adam Nawalka in action during their the Group D Euro 2016 qualifier match against Georgia.
displayImages.cleanCaption: The Poland head coach, Adam Nawalka, shows he still has a decent touch during their Group D qualifier match against Georgia.

displayImages.caption: Northern Ireland’s Gareth McAuley gets the better of Romania’s Florin Andone. Photograph: Peter Cziborra/Reuters
displayImages.altText: Northern Ireland’s Gareth McAuley getting the better of Romania’s Florin Andone.
displayImages.cleanCaption: Northern Ireland’s Gareth McAuley gets the better of Romania’s Florin Andone.

displayImages.caption: Portugal’s Cristiano Ronaldo celebrates his hat-trick. Photograph: Hugo Delgado/EPA
displayImages.altText: Portugal’s Cristiano Ronaldo listens to yet more adoration.
displayImages.cleanCaption: Portugal’s Cristiano Ronaldo celebrates his hat-trick.

displayImages.caption: Armenia’s Marcos Pizzelli tussles with Portugal’s Tiago. Photograph: Alexander Nemenov/AFP/Getty Images
displayImages.altText: Armenia’s Marcos Pizzelli having a tussle with Portugal’s Tiago.
displayImages.cleanCaption: Armenia’s Marcos Pizzelli tussles with Portugal’s Tiago.

displayImages.caption: Max Kruse celebrates Germany’s third goal against Gibraltar, scored by Ilkay Gündogan. Photograph: Alexander Hassenstein/Bongarts/Getty Images
displayImages.altText: Max Kruse tongue celebrates Germany’s third goal scored by Ilkay Guendogan against Gibraltar.
displayImages.cleanCaption: Max Kruse celebrates Germany’s third goal against Gibraltar, scored by Ilkay Gündogan.

displayImages.caption: Wales’ Gareth Bale battles past Belgium’s Nicolas Lombaerts. Photograph: Carl Recine/Reuters
displayImages.altText: Wales’ Gareth Bale looking to be unstoppable against Belgium’s Nicolas Lombaerts.
displayImages.cleanCaption: Wales’ Gareth Bale battles past Belgium’s Nicolas Lombaerts.

displayImages.caption: Ireland’s James McCarthy leaps clear of Scotland’s Scott Brown. Photograph: Inpho/Rex Shutterstock
displayImages.altText: Ireland’s James McCarthy leaps clear of Scotland’s Scott Brown.
displayImages.cleanCaption: Ireland’s James McCarthy leaps clear of Scotland’s Scott Brown.

displayImages.caption: The Republic of Ireland manager, Martin O’Neill, despairs at the final whistle against Scotland. Photograph: Brendan Moran/Sportsfile/Corbis
displayImages.altText: Republic of Ireland manager Martin O’Neill at the final whistle in their match Scotland.
displayImages.cleanCaption: The Republic of Ireland manager, Martin O’Neill, despairs at the final whistle against Scotland.

image.caption: Sweden’s Marcus Berg scores the opening goal, beating Montenegro’s goalkeeper Vukasin Poleksic. Photograph: Tt News Agency/Reuters
image.altText: Swedens’ Marcus Berg scores the opening goal beating Montenegro’s goalkeeper Vukasin Poleksic.
image.cleanCaption: Sweden’s Marcus Berg scores the opening goal, beating Montenegro’s goalkeeper Vukasin Poleksic.

image.caption: Wayne Rooney is met by the elbow of Slovenia’s Boston Cesar. Photograph: Samuel Kubani/AFP/Getty Images
image.altText: Wayne Rooney meets the elbow of Slovenia's Boston Cesar.
image.cleanCaption: Wayne Rooney is met by the elbow of Slovenia’s Boston Cesar.

image.altText: An England fan climbs to the top of the netting around the pitch after the final whistle in Slovenia.
image.cleanCaption: An England fan climbs the netting around the pitch after the final whistle in Slovenia.

image.altText: Poland’s head coach Adam Nawalka in action during their the Group D Euro 2016 qualifier match against Georgia.
image.cleanCaption: The Poland head coach, Adam Nawalka, shows he still has a decent touch during their Group D qualifier match against Georgia.
